lead_paragraph: Burnley manager Sean Dyche said he was unsure how Andre Gray would handle the reception from rival fans after homophobic social media posts earned him a four-game ban though he was certain the striker had learnt his lesson.

headline.print_headline: Dyche Hopes Burnley's Gray Can Move on After Lengthy Ban
headline.main: Dyche Hopes Burnley's Gray Can Move on After Lengthy Ban

snippet: Burnley manager Sean Dyche said he was unsure how Andre Gray would handle the reception from rival fans after homophobic social media posts earned him a four-game ban though he was certain the striker had learnt his lesson....
